snippet: The students, who were attending a band competition in the town of Olin, were injured after a concrete canopy hit by a truck collapsed, emergency medical workers said.
abstract: Concrete canopy over walkway collapses after being struck by truck, injuring at least 18 high school students attending band competition just north of Charlotte, NC.
lead_paragraph: The students, who were attending a band competition in the town of Olin, were injured after a concrete canopy hit by a truck collapsed, emergency medical workers said.

headline.main: North Carolina Students Hospitalized in Collapse of Canopy
headline.print_headline: Students Hospitalized in Collapse of Canopy
